item.title: Selena - Baila Esta Cumbia
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Baila Esta Cumbia on the ukulele by Selena Quintanilla. The chords used are G C.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos

item.title: Selena - Bidi Bidi Bom Bom (1994 Version)
item.description:
For educational use.
Key of C (Original Key is Bb). Chords used: C F G. Music by Selena Quintanilla.
*Volume adjusted
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. Music transposed using Ableton Live.

item.title: Selena - Como La Flor (1995)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Como La Flor on the ukulele by Selena Quintanilla. The chords used are C F G Am.
*Note - left out some passing tones I felt beginner students could not play fast enough. Chords left out are in ( ) below and are played during the chorus ... C (G/B) Am Am (G) F F (F#dim) G
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
